
Changelog
=========


v0.0.6
------

API
^^^

* Renamed builtin function name ``_path()`` to ``_fmt()``.

* Removed unused ``Func.__init__()`` argument ``conf``.

others
^^^^^^

* Added document (readthedocs).

* Improved value selection routine.
  Now errors should be more consistent.


v0.0.5
------

* First commit
